alert.note: Alert for Lamar (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 29 at 6:12PM CST until November 29 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lamar County in west central Alabama... * Until 715 PM CST. * At 612 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waverly, or over Columbus AFB, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Millport, Kennedy, Blooming Grove, Bedford, Crossville, Cody, Star, Hightogy, Lamar County Public Lake and Melborne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for west central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
